titleStmt.title: A true and humble representation of Iohn Downes esq; touching the death of the late King, so far as he may be concerned therein..
titleStmt.author: Downes, John, fl. 1666.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
This item "... cannot be said to err on the side of truth."--DNB.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
